data_description.additional_costs_buy_electricity: Template to calculate actual costs with additional fees. Use `value` to get current spot price. For example to add 21 percent VAT to the price use `'{{ value * 1.21 }}`
data_description.additional_costs_sell_electricity: Template to calculate actual costs with additional fees. Use `value` to get current spot price. For example to fixed 0.25 operator fee to the price use `'{{ value - 0.25 }}`
data_description.additional_costs_buy_gas: Template to calculate actual costs with additional fees. Use `value` to get current spot price.
